H0.text: In which country were the 1948 Winter Olympics held. Norway

H1.text: In which country were the 1948 Winter Olympics held. France

H2.text: In which country were the 1948 Winter Olympics held. Italy

H3.text: In which country were the 1948 Winter Olympics held. Suiza

A4.text: The 1948 Winter Olympics [...] were a winter multi-sport event held from 30 January to 8 February 1948 in St. Moritz, Switzerland.

A5.text: The IOC selected St. Moritz to host the 1948 Games [...] St. Moritz was chosen because all of the venues of the 1928 Winter Olympics were available [...]

A7.text: Rapport Général les Ves Jeux Olympiques D'hiver St. Moritz 1948 (PDF)
